title: Want to buy Pax sivir
body:
I want to buy Pax sivir Skin, anyone have the code of Pax sivir to sell ?

Pls contact

replies.body:
Due to a large amount of scams targeting people wanting skin codes, [Riot decided at the end of S4 to deactivate any existing skin codes.](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1805611&page=1#post16476923) The ones you receive now from events only last about a week before they expire. 

Sorry buddy, no pax Sivir :c

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1P1318jo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-14T05:46:40.714+0000)
>
> Due to a large amount of scams targeting people wanting skin codes, [Riot decided at the end of S4 to deactivate any existing skin codes.](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1805611&page=1#post16476923) The ones you receive now from events only last about a week before they expire. 
> 
> Sorry buddy, no pax Sivir :c

Ouch
